[Urgent] Academic Manager (IT Center for Kids, Income Up to 17Mil/month)
DigiUni Vietnam is a coding center for kids ages 4 to 18 years old with a big base of offline and online students, we are located in Binh Thanh dist, HCMC. We teach coding languages like Scratch, Python, HTML&CSS, Javascript and also graphic design like Photoshop and etc.
Salary range: base of 10,000,000 VND - 14,000,000 VND gross depending on experience and qualifications, monthly bonus based on performance up to 3,000,000 VND. Combined income is up to 17,000,000 VND/month.
Benefits: Competitive salary & KPI Bonuses, Full on-job training and ongoing professional development, Annual leave, social insurance, young and dynamic working environment, working in an international environment.
Job Description
Manage daily academic operations at the campus
Manage teachers' schedule and be responsible for assigning teachers for classes
Work closely with Customer Care/Sales Manager to ensure all curriculum activity is
scheduled effectively, also cooperate on developing projects and events
Develop and implement innovative teaching practices in consultation with the head of Academic department
Ensure quality and consistency of experience for students across all disciplines.
Represent the company during events or meetings with parents
Undertake lesson observations (QC & random spot check of recordings - online trial & actual
classes as well as joining offline classes), identify training needs and lead staff
training.
Train new and existing members of the academic team
Conduct weekly check-up of the Learning Management system.
Work with HR to recruit new members of the academic team
Teach fixed and trial classes at least 10 hours per week
JOB REQUIREMENTS
Requirements
Bachelor Degree in IT, Software/AI Engineering/Computer Science/Digital Marketing/Multimedia Design or any other related fields
English equivalent to IELTS 6-7
Teaching certificate is preferred
At least 2-3 years of teaching experience and supervisor/manager experience preferred
Passion for education and loves working with children
Great communication skills
Perseverance, hardworking, positive attitude, willing to learn quickly & always improve knowledge further
Technology savv
Please send your CV to maria@digiunivietnam.com

[Urgent] Academic Manager (IT Center for Kids, Income Up to 17Mil/month)
DigiUni Vietnam is a coding center for kids ages 4 to 18 years old with a big base of offline and online students, we are located in Binh Thanh dist, HCMC. We teach coding languages like Scratch, Python, HTML&CSS, Javascript and also graphic design like Photoshop and etc.
Salary range: base of 10,000,000 VND - 14,000,000 VND gross depending on experience and qualifications, monthly bonus based on performance up to 3,000,000 VND. Combined income is up to 17,000,000 VND/month.
Benefits: Competitive salary & KPI Bonuses, Full on-job training and ongoing professional development, Annual leave, social insurance, young and dynamic working environment, working in an international environment.
Job Description
Manage daily academic operations at the campus
Manage teachers' schedule and be responsible for assigning teachers for classes
Work closely with Customer Care/Sales Manager to ensure all curriculum activity is
scheduled effectively, also cooperate on developing projects and events
Develop and implement innovative teaching practices in consultation with the head of Academic department
Ensure quality and consistency of experience for students across all disciplines.
Represent the company during events or meetings with parents
Undertake lesson observations (QC & random spot check of recordings - online trial & actual
classes as well as joining offline classes), identify training needs and lead staff
training.
Train new and existing members of the academic team
Conduct weekly check-up of the Learning Management system.
Work with HR to recruit new members of the academic team
Teach fixed and trial classes at least 10 hours per week
JOB REQUIREMENTS
Requirements
Bachelor Degree in IT, Software/AI Engineering/Computer Science/Digital Marketing/Multimedia Design or any other related fields
English equivalent to IELTS 6-7
Teaching certificate is preferred
At least 2-3 years of teaching experience and supervisor/manager experience preferred
Passion for education and loves working with children
Great communication skills
Perseverance, hardworking, positive attitude, willing to learn quickly & always improve knowledge further
Technology savv
Please send your CV to maria@digiunivietnam.com

[Urgent] Academic Manager (IT Center for Kids, Income Up to 17Mil/month)
DigiUni Vietnam is a coding center for kids ages 4 to 18 years old with a big base of offline and online students, we are located in Binh Thanh dist, HCMC. We teach coding languages like Scratch, Python, HTML&CSS, Javascript and also graphic design like Photoshop and etc.
Salary range: base of 10,000,000 VND - 14,000,000 VND gross depending on experience and qualifications, monthly bonus based on performance up to 3,000,000 VND. Combined income is up to 17,000,000 VND/month.
Benefits: Competitive salary & KPI Bonuses, Full on-job training and ongoing professional development, Annual leave, social insurance, young and dynamic working environment, working in an international environment.
Job Description
Manage daily academic operations at the campus
Manage teachers' schedule and be responsible for assigning teachers for classes
Work closely with Customer Care/Sales Manager to ensure all curriculum activity is
scheduled effectively, also cooperate on developing projects and events
Develop and implement innovative teaching practices in consultation with the head of Academic department
Ensure quality and consistency of experience for students across all disciplines.
Represent the company during events or meetings with parents
Undertake lesson observations (QC & random spot check of recordings - online trial & actual
classes as well as joining offline classes), identify training needs and lead staff
training.
Train new and existing members of the academic team
Conduct weekly check-up of the Learning Management system.
Work with HR to recruit new members of the academic team
Teach fixed and trial classes at least 10 hours per week
JOB REQUIREMENTS
Requirements
Bachelor Degree in IT, Software/AI Engineering/Computer Science/Digital Marketing/Multimedia Design or any other related fields
English equivalent to IELTS 6-7
Teaching certificate is preferred
At least 2-3 years of teaching experience and supervisor/manager experience preferred
Passion for education and loves working with children
Great communication skills
Perseverance, hardworking, positive attitude, willing to learn quickly & always improve knowledge further
Technology savv
Please send your CV to maria@digiunivietnam.com

■ Tại sao phải chọn chúng tôi?
1. Làm chuyên và sâu về kỹ thuật + tiếng Nhật thì rất hoan nghênh đến với Công ty
2. Có cơ hội tiếp cận hệ thống lớn về fintech, làm việc và trao đổi kỹ thuật trực tiếp với kỹ sư Nhật có thể giúp kỹ năng của các bạn phát triển hơn.
3. Công ty có nhiều công ty con và sản phẩm product, có nhiều cơ hội để làm product với đúng mong muốn của các bạn
4. Có cơ hội lớn sang Nhật làm việc cho công ty mẹ, là tập đoàn tài chính hàng đầu Nhật Bản.
5. Được hỗ trợ học tiếng Nhật và được trang bị các kỹ năng cần thiết để có thể làm việc tại Nhật Bản.

[Urgent] Academic Manager (IT Center for Kids, Income Up to 17Mil/month)
DigiUni Vietnam is a coding center for kids ages 4 to 18 years old with a big base of offline and online students, we are located in Binh Thanh dist, HCMC. We teach coding languages like Scratch, Python, HTML&CSS, Javascript and also graphic design like Photoshop and etc.
Salary range: base of 10,000,000 VND - 14,000,000 VND gross depending on experience and qualifications, monthly bonus based on performance up to 3,000,000 VND. Combined income is up to 17,000,000 VND/month.
Benefits: Competitive salary & KPI Bonuses, Full on-job training and ongoing professional development, Annual leave, social insurance, young and dynamic working environment, working in an international environment.
Job Description
Manage daily academic operations at the campus
Manage teachers' schedule and be responsible for assigning teachers for classes
Work closely with Customer Care/Sales Manager to ensure all curriculum activity is
scheduled effectively, also cooperate on developing projects and events
Develop and implement innovative teaching practices in consultation with the head of Academic department
Ensure quality and consistency of experience for students across all disciplines.
Represent the company during events or meetings with parents
Undertake lesson observations (QC & random spot check of recordings - online trial & actual
classes as well as joining offline classes), identify training needs and lead staff
training.
Train new and existing members of the academic team
Conduct weekly check-up of the Learning Management system.
Work with HR to recruit new members of the academic team
Teach fixed and trial classes at least 10 hours per week
JOB REQUIREMENTS
Requirements
Bachelor Degree in IT, Software/AI Engineering/Computer Science/Digital Marketing/Multimedia Design or any other related fields
English equivalent to IELTS 6-7
Teaching certificate is preferred
At least 2-3 years of teaching experience and supervisor/manager experience preferred
Passion for education and loves working with children
Great communication skills
Perseverance, hardworking, positive attitude, willing to learn quickly & always improve knowledge further
Technology savv
Please send your CV to maria@digiunivietnam.com

Công ty Cổ phần Digital Fidelity Vietnam (DiFi) tuyển nhân viên SENIOR SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
I. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
• Phát triển các nền tảng của DiFi với vai trò software developer
• Tư vấn, đào tạo các team members mới
• Trao đổi với khách hàng: khơi gợi, tư vấn, phân tích nghiệp vụ với khách hàng
• Có thể làm team lead trong đó có giao việc, theo dõi tiến độ, hỗ trợ team members,v.v.
• Tham gia hoạch định chiến lược sản phẩm
II. YÊU CẦU TRÌNH ĐỘ
1. Tốt nghiệp đại học trở lên các ngành kỹ thuật về điện tử, công nghệ thông tin, cơ khí, hệ thống điện, hệ thống thông tin, v.v.
2. Tốt nghiệp các đại học top đầu như Bách Khoa, Quốc Gia, GTVT, v.v. là một lợi thế
3. Yêu cầu kinh nghiệm chuyên môn
a. Tối thiểu 3 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực phần mềm b. Thành thạo các kỹ năng sau là một lợi thế - Unix/Linux - RDBMS, No-Sql - Javascript (Node.js, Angular, React Native), Java - Tools: Git, Jira (Agile Scrum), Confluence, Figma
c. Có khả năng phân tích yêu cầu và đưa ra giải pháp thiết kế chi tiết
4. Có những kinh nghiệm sau là một lợi thế
a. Kinh nghiệm team leader
b. Kinh nghiệm xử lý các vấn đề kỹ thuật cả front end và back end
c. Kinh nghiệm giao tiếp với khách hàng d. Kinh nghiệm trao đổi các yêu cầu với đội phát triển phần mềm
5. Các kỹ năng cần có hoặc có khả năng học
a. Kỹ năng giao tiếp, thuyết phục, đàm phán
b. Kỹ năng viết báo cáo, làm slide trình chiếu
c. Kỹ năng tự học, tự tìm hiểu
d. Kỹ năng làm việc nhóm
e. Kỹ năng sử dụng tiếng Anh (tối thiểu là kỹ năng đọc)
III. CHẾ ĐỘ ,LƯƠNG, THƯỞNG 1. Lương thưởng
Thu nhập cạnh tranh (lương + thu nhập tăng thêm + thưởng) bằng hoặc cao hơn so với mặt bằng chung
Công ty hỗ trợ miễn phí ăn trưa, bữa xế (hoa quả, bánh kẹo, trà bánh
Xét tăng lương hàng năm
2. Chế độ
Vé gửi xe miễn phí
Được đóng BHXH & hưởng chế độ phúc lợi theo quy định của Nhà nước
Được thưởng các ngày Lễ, Tết, tham gia các hoạt động Team building định kỳ của Công ty
Được tham gia các khóa đào tạo chuyên môn, nâng cao năng lực & tư duy, được sử dụng và trau dồi thêm tiếng Anh
Cơ hội phát triển lên các vị trí phù hợp với mong muốn và khả năng
3. Thời gian làm việc
8h30 - 18h00 (flexbile)
Thứ 2 – Thứ 6, thứ 7 (remote work)
4. Môi trường làm việc
Trẻ trung, năng động, chính trực, minh bạch, rõ ràng; Luôn sẵn sàng lắng nghe các ý kiến đóng góp; Học tập, đổi mới, sáng tạo không ngừng; Được phép sai lầm; Hướng đến kết quả công việc
IV. THÔNG TIN LIÊN HỆ
